name: Tavernkeep
description:
Welcome to Tavernkeep!

Tavernkeep is a serving simulator that will have you rushing drinks and meals to rowdy tavern patrons as you run a fantasy tavern with your hot orc wife. 

Wizards, Royals, Orcs, and Warriors as patrons from every walk of fantasy life frequent your tavern

Seat people with their friends, or put them with their enemies as you discover who came to drink and who came to fight

Between patrons, as you break up fights, toss out rowdy drunks, and cry over freshly-broken tables as your patrons brawl

And hire a Barmaid, a Bard, and... a Farmer? To entertain your guests when tempers get high

Your tavern with 40+ furnishings and decorative items that feature everything from battle-tested tables to ornate tapestries

If you have any issues or find any bugs (features?) just let me know via comment and I'll see what I can do! To install Tavernkeep, download the zip file, unzip and run the Tavernkeep.exe!
